dc:title: Spring Appeal - Mar/April 1971
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Recalls the beginnings of their food line and the comradeship in cooking and serving "sturdy soup" and bread, and the occasional dangers in their work.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 508 1971-03-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
